ca1a1af8-1d1b-4eef-892b-8d92b0a89d41.Text: For the next attack against a target affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and block will be reduced by −(15 + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} × stacks of exploit)%. This attack will have +(15 + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} × stacks of exploit)% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. The attack will also do increased damage on a critical based on the type of attack: All attacks: 5 x {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % Bonus Critical Damage Single-shot and Single-target melee: Max Weapon Damage x 2 Area: Max Weapon Damage Burst: 2 x {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} Bonus Critical Chance and bonus damage equal to Minimum Weapon Damage

d9fe0ee9-f347-417a-9bdc-380fb74c9318.Text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +2 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.
